text: When using curl to send a POST request to my FastCGI application (using Apache 2.4.4 (win64) and mod_fcgid 2.3.7, curl sees the 100 Continue response BEFORE my script is even invoked. Which is incorrect (my script should be able to decide whether to reject the request with a 404 Not Found, which it wants to do, or reply with 100 Continue.
